stimulusHtml: In the xy-plane, a particle moves along the parabola y= x 2 −x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C11@ with a constant speed of 2 10 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@387F@ units per second. If dx dt >0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BEC@ , what is the value of dy dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A2B@ when the particle is at the point ( 2, 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B90@ ?
choicesHtml: 2 10 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3994@
